name: You Must Confront Vader
Text: 'Deploy on table.  Target a Skywalker who has completed Jedi Test #5.  While target on Dagobah, ''move phase'' on Save You It Can may be treated as ''deploy phase.''  Until Jedi Test completed, battles you initiate at Vader''s site are canceled and opponent loses 2 Force at start of your turn unless Vader is at a battleground site.  Attempt during your move phase when Vader with target (even as a non-frozen captive).  Vader and target duel: Each player draws destiny.  Add ability.  Highest total wins.  If target wins, test completed:  Leave on table.  Add one battle destiny in every battle.  Also, target is immune to attrition < 5.',
